summary: augments/Fixes the instant kill,when hitting the Ebony Warrior.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#00ff00][size=5]Short description:

Download 1:
augments/Fixes the instant kill,when hitting the Ebony Warrior. [/size][/color][/b]

[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Download 2:
completely removes the reflect blows perk of the Ebony warrior
[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Notice: changed description from saying "Fixes a bug" to  "augments the Instakill", because people misunderstood the purpose and the idea of this mod and my reason for making it. Read before you judge.

And before you ask, yes you can actually be instakilled without using a Cheat/exploit, as Hallodria already said in the comments.[/color]


[b][size=3]New: added a file you can download that completely removes the refelect blows perk of the ebony warrior, for those still having a bug or just dont want him having the perk at all, if you dont like it.[/size][/b]

[b][i][u][size=4]For People who say this isnt a bug (i know what you mean):[/size][/u][/i][/b]

If you Fight the Ebony Warrior, there is a chance that you will be killed instant of your own attack because of his "Reflect Blows" Perk, especially when using "Marked for Death" shout.

Thats fine to me, i mean he is supposed to be a real challenge and everything, but....

in my Game this Perk of his was Bugged and i got killed even when i was on full health (400 HP) 
and attacked him with an Iron dagger that did 10 Damage and was not enchanted
and when i used the "Marked for Death" shout,i got killed on every first hit.

Many people seemed to have that kind of bug or similar, so i decided to make a Fix.

I encounted no Problems with this mod and everything worked fine,
but if this doesnt fix it for you, send me a message, maybe i can help.

! ATTENTION !

the Perk is NOT disabled and the Ebony Warrior is NOT weakend, you can still be killed by this Perk, 
if you have to low health, but now it should work fine, 
that means it should be a real 10% chance and not a 90%-100% chance.
